Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/95th
ShortDescription: Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 86th pl, due to street blockage near Halsted/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, 86th pl, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/95th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52A Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/54th Place
ShortDescription: 52A Kedzie buses temp. rrtd NB: Kedzie, 87th, California, 83rd, Kedzie; SB: Kedzie, 87th, California, 79th, Kedzie, due to street blockage at Kedzie/54th Place

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52A Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Kedzie/54th Place.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 87th, California, 83rd, then resume their route on Kedzie 

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 83rd, California, 79th, then resume their route on Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
